participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Caring and resilient, he tries to connect with others despite his struggles.
participant_1.background: i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio.

participant_2.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.
